channel.title: Less is better comments on Hanselminutes

item.title: "Hanselminutes": comment by leon bambrick
item.description:
glad you like timeSnapper! If you have any problems or suggestions please drop by and leave a comment ( or visit the forum: http://groups.google.com/group/timesnapper?lnk=oa )

cheers! leon

item.title: "Hanselminutes" by jlam
item.description: Scott Hanselman is podcasting. I’m a huge fan of his recommendations on almost anything. I discovered Timesnapper by listening to his podcast today during lunch.
